paper.title: Place or Transition Petri Nets
paper.venue: Lectures on Petri Nets I: Basic Models, Advances in Petri Nets, the volumes are based on the Advanced Course on Petri Nets
paper.abstract: This contributions provides an introduction to the theory of place/transition Petri nets. Topics include the sequential and the concurrent behavior of place/ transition Petri nets, marking graphs and coverability trees, and some analysis techniques that are based on the structure of place/transition Petri nets.
